lead_paragraph: The rate on direct loans for undergraduates will be 3.76 percent, down from 4.29 percent. For graduate students, it will be 5.31 percent, down from 5.84 percent.

headline.print_headline: Rates on Federal Student Loans Are Falling for This Year
headline.main: Rates on Federal Student Loans Are Falling

snippet: The rate on direct loans for undergraduates will be 3.76 percent, down from 4.29 percent. For graduate students, it will be 5.31 percent, down from 5.84 percent.
